revised_title: Exact Analytical Solutions for the Few-Particle Schrödinger Equation: A Perturbation Study
tldr: This article presents a perturbation study on finding exact analytical solutions for the few-particle Schrödinger equation. The authors use Rayleigh-Schrodinger perturbation theory to analyze restricted two- and three-body systems. They demonstrate the procedure by applying it to a hydrogen atom perturbed by stationary point charges, providing results for the ground and some excited states.
